::Spears::

She saw that he was at least trying to be nice to her.  She smiled 
slightly. "Well, there isn't much left of it.  That's why Ramulus and 
I went to my landing pod.  To try to get spare parts out of it.  The 
sides have huge holes, the engines are shot, the paint is rusting 
off, and to top it all off, the roof leaks."  She chuckled.
"But I'll give you the grand tour." she winced as her side hurt.
"Just as soon as I get fixed up." she smiled. Maybe he won't hold a 
her changing sides against her after all.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Striker::
> 
> Striker walks silently along with Spears, his thoughts heavy. He 
could tell 
> that she was sad, and he was a bit mad at himself for reacting that 
way. He 
> sighs quietly. Why did he doubt that she was a sincere Maximal? He 
could tell 
> she had a good spark, and a good sence of humor. He had yet to see 
any 
> Predacons with that quality. He walks closer to her.
> 
> "Hey, when you're out of the CR chamber at the Ark, you want me to 
give you a 
> tour of our base?" he asks, trying to change the subject. He was 
mad at 
> himself for reacting as he did, and hoped that she wasn't mad at 
him for it.
